subject: Test isolation
msgSnippet: ... If you can find Kent Beck s Test-Driven Development: By Example, read the testing pattern called Isolated Test . Or try Googling isolated test . Or try
messageBody:
cypherfox wrote:

> I admit, I don't understand the logic in this, and am looking for
> help.

If you can find Kent Beck's Test-Driven Development: By Example, read
the testing pattern called "Isolated Test". Or try Googling "isolated
test". Or try reading this paper:

http://www.xprogramming.com/testfram.htm
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
